title: FDA Acknowledges OmniActive’s Lutemax Free Lutein for Use in Infant Formula
snippet: OmniActive’s Lutemax Free Lutein receives GRAS acknowledgment from FDA for infant-formula use.

title: Lutemax Free Lutein Obtains FDA GRAS Clearance for Infant Formula Use
snippet: The FDA has granted GRAS clearance for OmniActive’s Lutemax Free Lutein ingredient for use in infant formula.

title: OmniActive’s Lutemax Free Lutein – Infant Formula Milestone
snippet: The U.S. FDA has granted GRAS clearance for OmniActive’s Lutemax Free Lutein for infant formula use.

title: Consumers Report Mixed Results with Lutemax 2020 Supplements
snippet: While many users reported improved eye comfort, others saw minimal changes after several weeks.

title: Concerns Raised on Lutemax 2020 Efficacy for Eye Fatigue

title: Clinical Study Shows CurcuWIN Supports Joint Mobility
snippet: Participants experienced improved flexibility and reduced discomfort with CurcuWIN supplementation.

title: Capsimax Product Page: Weight Management Ingredient from OmniActive

title: Capsimax Causes Heartburn in Sensitive Individuals
